languages.text: Почтенный спутник Лорд-капитана Хейнрикс ван Калокс лично повел матросов на самые пострадавшие палубы. Убоявшихся и трусливо отказывающихся исполнить свой долг он вразумлял словом, прежде чем очистить их сердца от страха выстрелом — воистину, как велико милосердие этого человека.

traits.locale_text: Почтенный спутник Лорда-Капитана Хейнрикс ван Калокс лично повел матросов на самые пострадавшие палубы. Убоявшихся и трусливо отказывающихся исполнить свой долг он трижды вразумлял словом, прежде чем очистить их сердца от страха выстрелом из лазгана — воистину, как велико милосердие этого человека.

languages.text: The Lord Captain's honourable companion Heinrix van Calox personally led the ship's hands to the most seriously damaged decks. First, he admonished the cowardly crew members who refused to do their duty, and then he banished the fear from their hearts with a single shot. Verily, the man's mercy is great indeed.
languages.original_text: Почтенный спутник Лорд-капитана Хейнрикс ван Калокс лично повел матросов на самые пострадавшие палубы. Убоявшихся и трусливо отказывающихся исполнить свой долг он вразумлял словом, прежде чем очистить их сердца от страха выстрелом — воистину, как велико милосердие этого человека.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain's honorable companion Heinrix van Calox personally led the ship's hands to the most seriously damaged decks. First, he admonished the cowardly crew members who refused to do their duty, and then he banished the fear from their hearts with a single shot. Verily, the man's mercy is great indeed.

The Lord Captain's honorable companion Heinrix van Calox personally led the ship's hands to the most seriously damaged decks. First, he admonished the cowardly crew members who refused to do their duty, and then he banished the fear from their hearts with a single shot. Verily, the man's mercy is great indeed.

The Lord Captain's honorable companion Heinrix van Calox personally led the ship's hands to the most seriously damaged decks. First, he admonished the cowardly crew members who refused to do their duty, and then he banished the fear from their hearts with a single shot. Verily, the man's mercy is great indeed.

The Lord Captain's honourable companion Heinrix van Calox personally led the ship's hands to the most seriously damaged decks. First, he admonished the cowardly crew members who refused to do their duty, and then he banished the fear from their hearts with a single shot. Verily, the man's mercy is great indeed.

languages.text: El honorable Heinrix van Calox, acompañante de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, guio personalmente al personal de la nave a las cubiertas más dañadas. Primero reprochó a los tripulantes cobardes el que no cumplieran su deber y después desterró el miedo de sus corazones con un único disparo. En verdad, la compasión de este hombre es algo singular.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's honourable companion Heinrix van Calox personally led the ship's hands to the most seriously damaged decks. First, he admonished the cowardly crew members who refused to do their duty, and then he banished the fear from their hearts with a single shot. Verily, the man's mercy is great indeed.

traits.locale_text: El honorable Heinrix van Calox, acompañante de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, guio personalmente al personal de la nave a las cubiertas más dañadas. Primero reprochó a los tripulantes cobardes el que no cumplieran su deber y después desterró el miedo de sus corazones con un único disparo. En verdad, la compasión de este hombre es algo singular.

languages.text: 舰长大人尊贵的同伴海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯亲自带领他的手下，前往受损最严重的甲板。他先是严辞斥责了那些拒绝履行职责的懦弱船员，之后开了一枪，驱散了所有人心中的恐惧。毫无疑问，这个人的仁慈心肠有目共睹。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's honourable companion Heinrix van Calox personally led the ship's hands to the most seriously damaged decks. First, he admonished the cowardly crew members who refused to do their duty, and then he banished the fear from their hearts with a single shot. Verily, the man's mercy is great indeed.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人尊贵的同伴海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯亲自带领他的手下，前往受损最严重的甲板。他先是严辞斥责了那些拒绝履行职责的懦弱船员，之后开了一枪，驱散了所有人心中的恐惧。毫无疑问，这个人的仁慈心肠有目共睹。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの誉れある仲間であるハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、船のクルーを最も深刻な被害を受けたデッキまで自ら先導した。初めに任務を放棄する臆病なクルー達を戒め、一発の銃声をもってその心から恐怖を追い払った。まさに、偉大な慈悲をお持ちの方だ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's honourable companion Heinrix van Calox personally led the ship's hands to the most seriously damaged decks. First, he admonished the cowardly crew members who refused to do their duty, and then he banished the fear from their hearts with a single shot. Verily, the man's mercy is great indeed.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの誉れある仲間であるハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、船のクルーを最も深刻な被害を受けたデッキまで自ら先導した。初めに任務を放棄する臆病なクルー達を戒め、一発の銃声をもってその心から恐怖を追い払った。まさに、偉大な慈悲をお持ちの方だ。

languages.text: Der ehrenwerte Gefährte des Herrn Kapitäns, Heinrix van Calox, führte die Schiffsleute persönlich zu den am schwersten beschädigten Decks. Zuerst ermahnte er die feigen Besatzungsmitglieder, die sich weigerten, ihre Pflicht zu tun, und dann vertrieb er die Angst aus ihren Herzen mit einem einzigen Schuss. Wahrlich, die Barmherzigkeit dieses Mannes ist wirklich groß.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's honourable companion Heinrix van Calox personally led the ship's hands to the most seriously damaged decks. First, he admonished the cowardly crew members who refused to do their duty, and then he banished the fear from their hearts with a single shot. Verily, the man's mercy is great indeed.

languages.text: L'honorable compagnon {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, Heinrix van Calox, a personnellement dirigé les membres d'équipage vers les ponts les plus gravement endommagés. Dans un premier temps, il a admonesté les plus lâches qui refusaient d'accomplir leur devoir puis, d'un seul coup de feu, a banni la peur de leur cœur. La miséricorde de cet homme est proprement stupéfiante.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's honourable companion Heinrix van Calox personally led the ship's hands to the most seriously damaged decks. First, he admonished the cowardly crew members who refused to do their duty, and then he banished the fear from their hearts with a single shot. Verily, the man's mercy is great indeed.

traits.locale_text: L'honorable compagnon {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, Heinrix van Calox, a personnellement dirigé les membres d'équipage vers les ponts les plus gravement endommagés. Dans un premier temps, il a admonesté les plus lâches qui refusaient d'accomplir leur devoir puis, d'un seul coup de feu, a banni la peur de leur cœur. La miséricorde de cet homme est proprement stupéfiante.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın şerefli yoldaşı Heinrix van Calox, geminin onarım ekiplerini en ciddi hasar görmüş güvertelere bizzat yönlendirdi. Evvela görevlerini yapmayı reddeden korkak mürettebatı uyardı, ardından yüreklerindeki korkuyu tek bir vuruşla bertaraf etti. Bu beyefendinin merhameti hakikaten sonsuz.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's honourable companion Heinrix van Calox personally led the ship's hands to the most seriously damaged decks. First, he admonished the cowardly crew members who refused to do their duty, and then he banished the fear from their hearts with a single shot. Verily, the man's mercy is great indeed.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın onurlu eşlikçisi Heinrix van Calox, geminin onarım ekiplerini en ciddi hasar görmüş güvertelere bizzat yönlendirdi. Öncelikle görevlerini yapmayı reddeden korkak mürettebatı ihtar etti, ardından kalplerindeki korkuyu tek bir vuruşla bertaraf etti. Bu beyefendinin merhameti gerçekten de sonsuz.
